snippet: The bride is the buying manager for the online division, in Manhattan, of Gucci; the groom is the president of Kitchensurfing.com, an owner of Eater.com and a director of Hot Bread Kitchen, a Harlem group that prepares women for culinary careers.
lead_paragraph: The bride is the buying manager for the online division, in Manhattan, of Gucci; the groom is the president of Kitchensurfing.com, an owner of Eater.com and a director of Hot Bread Kitchen, a Harlem group that prepares women for culinary careers.
